s:workflowdescription.author: Marco Roos (workfllow), Willem R. van Hage (services)
s:workflowdescription.title: AddScoreToSemanticModel

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription:
Add Likelihood Score to Semantic model with Sesame service cf example Score:
N-Triples examples: <http://rdf.adaptivedisclosure.org/owl/BioAID/myModel/Enriched-ontology/BiologicalDiscoveries.owl#ExampleInstance_DiscoveredEnzyme> <http://rdf.adaptivedisclosure.org/owl/BioAID/myModel/Enriched-ontology/DiscoveredEntities.owl#hasLikelihoodScore> "1.0"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .
<http://rdf.adaptivedisclosure.org/owl/BioAID/myModel/Enriched-ontology/BiologicalDiscoveries.owl#ExampleInstance_DiscoveredProtein> <http://rdf.adaptivedisclosure.org/owl/BioAID/myModel/Enriched-ontology/DiscoveredEntities.owl#hasLikelihoodScore> "2.0"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .
Turtle: <http://rdf.adaptivedisclosure.org/owl/BioAID/myModel/Enriched-ontology/BiologicalDiscoveries.owl#ExampleInstance_DiscoveredEnzyme> dsc:hasLikelihoodScore "1.0"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float> .
